p: The title compound was prepared from the reaction of compound 15c (0.6 g, 2 mmol) with 1-naphthyl isothiocyanate (0.41 g, 2.2 mmol) according to the general procedure A. Compound 20c was obtained as white amorphous solid product, m.p. 287–9 °C, yield 68%.
